name: Round Shield of the Bear
quote: Ducking, dodging, or evading you won't have to worry about your stamina.
description: A light-weight shield that maintains its hardended and tough blocking capabilities.

name: Swift Morning Star of the Badger
quote: Oranges or foes... you will beat them into a pulp
description: Send quick and powerful blows into your enemy.

name: Alkaizer's Zweihander of the Damned
quote: RUN...
description: Tempered by the malice of countless malevolent beings it has slained, this famed weapon of Alkaizer strikes fear into the very soul of its foes.

name: Peacekeeper Plate Greaves
quote: You maintain the peace with each solid stride.
description: Light weight iron plate greaves. Primarily used by knights who pledge themselves to the holy order

name: Oathsworn Plate Gauntlets
quote: You swore an oath, and till death... you must keep it.
description: Strong and flexible plate gauntlets allowing you to wield your weapon with strength.

name: Heavy Chestplate of the Mountain
quote: You may not be able to throw a punch, but you can sure take one
description: This heavy iron chestpiece protects you from the heaviest of strikes, however, at a cost of speed. Worn by the strongest and toughest of king's gaurdmen.

name: Vanguard Steel Legplates
quote: Zippers not included
description: Strong, overlapping steel legplates (resembling scales) that allows the wearer to main flexability while maintaining protection.

name: Greathelm of Valor
quote: Eye-slits now 30% smaller
description: Worn over a mail coif, this beautiful helmet with its menacing, narrow eye slits was a strong, tough steel helmet fully capable of absorbing the shock of combat.

name: Heart Necklace
quote: This necklace radiates a soft pink aura, and feels warm to the touch.
effect: At the end of combat, restore 10HP
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Sharp Ring
quote: A silver ring adorned with mysterious runes written in a forgotten language. The runes light up when the wearer feels threatened.
effect: Your first attack of each combat deals 10 additional damage.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Safety Ring
quote: A small ring with a bright orange gemstone embedded inside of it. You feel safer just by wearing it.
effect: Gain 10 Armor at the start of each combat.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Stealth Stone
quote: A beautiful purple stone that shrouds the user in shadows.
effect: Gain 1 Stealth at the start of each combat.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Radiant Ring
quote: A multi-coloured ring which alternates between red, blue, green, and yellow.
effect: Start each combat with 1 additional MP.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Mithril Ring
quote: A dark blue ring adorned with mysterious runes. The runes light up when it senses danger.
effect: If you end a turn without any Armor, gain 10 Armor.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Viper Ring
quote: A dark green ring adorned with etchings of snakes. The origins of this ring are shrouded in mystery.
effect: Whenever you apply Poison to an enemy, apply 1 additional stack of Poison.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Skull Ring
quote: A ring made in the shape of a skull. The origins of this ring are shrouded in mystery.
effect: Whenever your HP drops below 50%, double your ATK for the rest of combat.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Alchemy Ring
quote: A peculiar ring forged in the shape of a potion bottle. Said to be made by a legendary alchemist who could turn lead into gold.
effect: Whenever you drink a potion, heal 10HP in addition to it's normal effect.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Dragoon Ring
quote: A dark red ring adorned with etchings of dragons. The origins of this ring are shrouded in mystery.
effect: Whenever an enemy is defeated, gain 1MP
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Sprint Shoes
quote: There's nothing magical about these shoes. They just make you run really, REALLY fast.
effect: Dramatically increases the wearers speed and reflexes.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Sun Cloak
quote: The sun singers made a whole assortment of fashionable gear. Not the strongest by any means, but definately the most stylish.
effect: Restores a small amount of HP over time as long as the user is exposed to sunlight.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Moon Cloak
quote: This cloak provides a high level of camoflague at night, but really makes you stick out during the day.
effect: If exposed to moonlight, gain 1 additional MP at the start of every turn
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: Fairy Staff
quote: This weapon is not designed for combat. Often gifted to children to teach them the fundamentals of magic.
description: Paragragh a
Paragragh b

name: wind reaper mace
quote: A cold wind blowing from the north, made the trees rustle like living things -- George R.R. Martin --
description: This mace once belonged to a righteous mage, and it has struck blows in pursuit of equivocal justice. It crackles with storm-wrought power and unleashes claws of lightning that rake surrounding enemies with their coruscating energy. Significantly increases magic attack and critical damage caused to the enemy

name: staff of the fallen star
quote: I promise you feel nothing...
description: Greed seethes from the tip of this wretched weapon, robbing its victims of life and coin. Echoing its former master's cruel intent, the barbs of its face whispers a constant taunt to those it has slain. Massively increase magic attack and speed.

name: scepter of doom
quote: Everybody wants a happy ending, right? But it doesn’t always roll that way.
description: An ancient legend of the makers describes the origin of this weapon thusly: A master smith, proud and vain, met a wanderer who posed him a wager. The wanderer claimed that none could forge a weapon that blended both the essence of fire and ice together in balance. Determined to win this challenge, the smith bent his considerable skills towards the crafting of The scepter of the doom.

This weapon stands as a testament to that legendary smith's skill, and as a trophy of his victory in the wanderer's wager. The weilder of this weapon gets insane power that nothing can stand in his way.

name: chain coat
quote: Feeling cold ...
description: While it weighs more and provides less protection than other medium armors, it is also less of a hindrance. Basic garment that protects the mage from the harsh winter. Mildly increases health points

name: flaming leather boots
quote: Following’s not really my style...
effect: Gain +25 bonus defence when worn in combination with flaming pants
description: Worn by a former master of trials, whose feet seemed to be quite small. They're a little snug. Dont be decieved by their looks they are light and fast.

name: flaming pants
quote: Following’s not really my style...
effect: Gain +25 bonus defence when worn in combination with flaming-leather-boots
description: Worn by a former master of trials, these pants are lightweight. Increase speed stats.

name: ox horn helmet
quote: It’s not a problem if you don’t look up.
description: Looks are decieveing. Only a gentle soul can wear it and stand the enemy's deadly blows. Significantly increases magic defence and health stats.

name: spiked shoulder plate
description: It has been mages best friend to protect against fatal sword strikes. Greatly increases defence and health stats.

name: bracelet of dismay
quote: Whoever said the small things don't matter has never seen a match start a wildfire -- Beau Taplin
description: Its not your regular beauty item. It unleashes a great power only a few have survived to tell the tale of. Enhances the accuracy stats

name: tranquility gauntlets
quote: Contrary to popular belief, I know exactly what I’m doing.
description: Gives the abiltiy to squash anything like a fly with inner harmoney. Significantly increases critical damage and accuracy stats.

name: sacred dagger
quote: You won't be getting any mercy from me...
description: A finely crafted weapon, engraved with the holy symbol of a goddess of honor.Slightly increases attack.

name: cursed backbiter dagger
quote: You may have caught me off guard once, but......not again!
description: Every strike by this weapon is accompanied by eerie silence. Significantly increases attack and Critical damage.

name: dagger of evils
quote: I'll be able to shut up a lot of fat heads with this.
description: This masterwork dagger is said to have once belonged to a forgotten god of war.Enemies slain by this weapon are consumed by flames. Massively increases attack and accuracy stats.

name: dagger of thunderbolts
quote: Everybody wants a happy ending, right? But it doesn’t always roll that way.
description: In his seclusion, the Mad Smith finely crafted an arsenal in which to arm his creations. A brutal axe capable of tearing armor asunder, its edges hellbent on the very dismemberment of creation.
This ornate weapon is said to have once belonged to a forgotten god of war. Foes slain by this weapon dissolve into shards of shattered bone.Insanely increases attack and critical damage stats

name: studded leather
description: While it weighs more and provides less protection than other medium armors, it is also less of a hindrance.  Mildly increases health points

name: skybiter boots
quote: Following’s not really my style...
description: A finely crafted armor, engraved with geometric patterns. Significantly increases speed and evasion.

name: helmet of shadrael
quote: I'm just full of surprises.
description: One belonged to a wise man this helmet gives its wearer the power of insight. Significantly increases accuracy and evasion

name: gauntlets of justice
quote: When the will defies fear, when duty throws the gauntlet down to fate, when honor scorns to compromise with death, that is heroism -- Robert Green Ingersoll
description: This armored gauntlet has small chains and braces that allows the wearer to attach a weapon to the gauntlet so that it cannot be dropped easily. Massively increases critical rate and accuracy.

name: devotion shoulder plate
effect: Gains bonus +50 speed when worn in combination with devotion chausses
description: This ornate piece of armor is said to have been blessed by the Goddess of Luck herself. Greatly increases defence and health stats.

name: devotion chausses
effect: Gains bonus +50 speed when worn in combination with devotion shoulder plate
description: This ornate piece of armor is said to have been blessed by the Goddess of Luck herself. Greatly increases defence and health stats.

name: blazing chainmail
quote: Contrary to popular belief, I know exactly what I’m doing.
description: This mighty armor once belonged to the halfling ranger Master Bolgee, who slew the Beast of the Mount Fells. Insanely increases health and defence stats.

name: King Breaker Bow
quote: A reminder that while so few Breakers remain, His Majesty still stands.
description: "King Breaker" was the label given to those who first rose to betray the King. While their efforts were made in the best interest of the people, most king breakers were hunted down and eliminated, their bows taken as trophies.

In a ironic twist of fate, the very weapons once used in an effort to assassinate the King are now prized possessions for Royal Guards—not only for their storied history, but for the chance to get their hands on fully functional Magic weaponry.
